solution_line_template: He spends {monday_ticket_cost}*{wednesday_multiplier}=$<<{monday_ticket_cost}*{wednesday_multiplier}={wednesday_cost}>>{wednesday_cost} on Wednesday to pay for a movie ticket.
He spends {monday_ticket_cost}*{saturday_multiplier}=$<<{monday_ticket_cost}*{saturday_multiplier}={saturday_cost}>>{saturday_cost} on Saturday to pay for a movie ticket.
